confirm.description: Do you want to set up Sonos?

abort.not_sonos_device: Discovered device is not a Sonos device

subscriptions_failed.title: Networking error: subscriptions failed
subscriptions_failed.description:
Falling back to polling, functionality may be limited.

Sonos device at {device_ip} cannot reach Home Assistant at {listener_address}.

See our [documentation]({sub_fail_url}) for more information on how to solve this issue.
